company_description: ApplyBoard is an online marketplace designed to help international students apply to educational institutions in Canada and the USA. The platform is used by students, schools, and recruiters, to facilitate and streamline the application process, including visa application, airport pickup, and other services. Applicants using ApplyBoard have seen a 95% acceptance rate.

An enterprise digital contracting platform that allows for the automation and streamlining of contract creation, negotiation, approvals, execution and storage. Arteria was founded within Deloitte Canadaâs AI practice and is being spun-out in order to encourage rapid development of the platform.

Avidbots has built Neo, the world’s only truly autonomous floor scrubbing robot. The company serves customers across a variety of industries, from airports and transit terminals to warehouses, universities and hospitals. By automating the cleaning process, Avidbots provides better cleaning at a much lower price point.

For the top 50 pharmaceutical companies, BenchSci is the only preclinical R&D SaaS platform that brings novel medicine to patients 50% faster with 80% fewer experiments. BenchSci achieves this by decoding the world's biomedical data with machine learning to increase experimental success, eliminate wasted work, and drive scientific discovery. Unlike other companies using AI for drug discovery, BenchSci doesn't compete with pharmaceutical companies but equips their scientists with a powerful platform of AI-enabled applications to develop drugs better, faster, and more cost-effectively themselves.
A SaaS platform focusing on the $48B daycare industry. A mobile-first solution, it is building a platform that delivers the full value chain for both daycare service providers and parents.
Faire is a two-sided marketplace and wholesale platform that helps retailers find and buy unique wholesale merchandise for their stores while helping brands and makers reach local retailers.
A real-time, end-to-end spend automation platform to eliminate expense reports and reimbursements to make business spending effortless.
A sales performance management (SPM) platform that utilizes fundamental business rules, automates payouts and creates a ledger of truth for sales teams.
Neo is building Canadaâs most customer-centric everyday spending rewards platform.
A marketplace for the restaurant repair and maintenance industry. ResQ helps streamline the servicing process by connecting restaurants with professionally qualified vendors.
Skip the Dishes is a mobile and online ordering platform. Acquired by JustEat (LSE: JE).
A SaaS-enabled marketplace for satellite data and intelligence.
autonomous vehicles
A community that brings together aspiring and professional writers with readers in a highly engaging environment. Acquired by Naver.

Xanadu produces a universal quantum processor leveraging a photonic cluster state model. Xanadu offers a more scalable and affordable architecture for quantum computing that can operate at room temperature.
ActionX is a mobile app for cross-screen retargeting. Acquired by WPP (LSE: WPP).
Web3 powered workspaces

Alyce is an AI-powered Personal Experience Platform that helps Enterprise sales and marketing teams create personal bonds with their prospects, customers and partners through one-to-one gifting. This unique approach creates relatable, relevant and respectful outreach that appeals to the person behind the persona to build rapport, earn trust and drive loyalty.

Apptentive is a customer feedback solution that measures shifts in sentiment from customer experience to win back consumers and activate fans. The Apptentive solution helps enterprise brands including Starbucks, Dunkin Donuts, Jetblue, and eBay. Apptentive captures actionable emotions and feedback from the 90 percent of consumer voices typically missed, and quickly turns that feedback into action.
A fixed-price auto hauling marketplace. Auto Hauler removes the need for brokers and empowers carriers to pick up loads directly.

An AI platform used to passively measure mental health. The product helps organizations measure and predict levels of stress, burnout, depression and anxiety across teams while protecting user privacy.

Barley is a compensation management software that's fast, transparent, and unified. Barley helps companies make better pay decisions every day by combining pay bands, compensation reviews, pay equity, and candidate benchmarking into one single easy-to-use platform.
Business intelligence platform for medtech and pharma companies – providing analytics and insights that guide strategic product development decisions.
Bettermode is a cloud-based community building platform that provides a suite of tools to create and maintain thriving online communities.
A live trivia network that combines the mass appeal of trivia with the paid mechanics of sports betting

Biossil is an applied AI drug discovery platform developing targeted therapies for biologically defined patient sub-populations. Biossil is focused on diseases for which traditional drug discovery has been challenged by population variability.

An epidemic intelligence solution that helps governments protect citizens, global enterprises anticipate and manage risk, and help hospitals protect the health of their frontline providers and patients.
DevSecOps Automation Platform to Secure your Software Supply Chain
Brkaway empowers creators to run their entire content business while allowing brands to manage their content pipeline
Bunch is a synchronous social network that sits on top of multiplayer games. Bunch allows you to chat live with your friends before, during and after a game session.

Callia is a consumer floral marketplace, selling standardized products direct from the warehouse to the customer. By owning the last mile, they are able to provide consistently delightful experiences.
An AI-differentiated, real-time player-vs-player, squad-based game with deep social elements.

Clearco invests in entrepreneurs to help them grow their web-enabled businesses. The Company uses AI-powered proprietary underwriting technology to offer capital faster, and on better terms than traditional financing options.
Composer is a no-code platform for automated investment management. Composer allows you to build, test, deploy, and manage automated investing strategies - all without writing a line of code.

Configure8 is building a platform that empowers developers and devops engineers by simplifying and accelerating service development. With configure8, developers and devops can create, manage, and discover services with ease and flexibility.
Crux makes software to enable autonomous control room operations for pipeline and midstream facilities in the oil and gas industry.
Cybrid is a Crypto Banking as a Service provider that integrates seamlessly with exchanges, custodians, and banks.
A low-code workflow automation platform for enterprise. Daylight turns manual internal processes into streamlined, automated experiences.

Delphia believes data is the key to capital formation and economic empowerment. We build products that incentivize the contribution of proprietary data in order to generate an edge in financial markets. We believe that actively managing peopleâs data can unlock new forms of wealth creation for individual and institutional investors alike.

Disco is a live learning platform that allows creators, experts and next-gen teachers to easily build paid classes. It manages the end-to-end experience so that creators can focus on what they do best—engaging their communities.

Diversio is the people intelligence platform that measures, tracks, and improves diversity & inclusion. Through their powerful AI-based “Recommendation Engine”, companies generate real-world business solutions to specific problem areas, leading to measurable & trackable improvement.
An ultrasound based haptic interface for virtual and augmented reality. Emerge allows users to interact with the virtual world using only their bare hands, no controller required.

EnPowered is an energy innovator driving the adoption of clean energy. They help all types of organizations transform their energy spend, unlocking immense savings by changing the way we manage energy costs.
Bringing human skills mainstream
Erthos creates multi-platform resins that can leverage the world’s existing plastic manufacturing value chain to produce plant-based alternative plastics.
Gigi helps brands and agencies buy and measure streaming TV ads.

Horizon's Sequence platform will provide a scalable Ethereum architecture for third-parties to build and launch decentralized games that are provably fair, enable true digital ownership, and that reward activity by players on the network.
A SaaS marketplace that automates completion of security & compliance documents through machine learning.
An enterprise SaaS platform that connects front-line employees with the management layer.
Infinity Quick is a consumer application that brings messaging to life with animated avatar based messaging. Acquired by Zynga (NASDAQ: ZNGA).
Influitive captures and promotes the enthusiasm that a company's advocates (customers, partners, fans, evangelists) have for the company and its products.
An e-commerce platform that is building the first global tattoo brand. Acquired in 2022 by BIC Group.
InterationOS is a modern SDK for building and deploying hyper scaleable event queues and pipelines. Scale to tens of billions.
A marketplace for the North American home maintenance industry. Jiffy seamlessly delivers an instant appointment to homeowners, saving them time and money.
Joist is a mobile and web application for small business contractors to estimate, invoice, record and process payments, and manage projects from anywhere. Acquired by EverCommerce.
Kitchenmate is building the automated restaurant for the workplace; providing fresh, convenient, delicious meals at the touch of a button.
Spatial computing company focused on immersive learning and 3D entertainment.
A cloud-based data platform that puts mobile application owners in full control of their data, while streamlining the integration process with multiple partners.

An operating system for carbon removal and carbon capture companies that enables precise CO2 tracking through their operations and value chain, resulting in strong data provenance, streamlined access to carbon markets and emerging tax and compliance regimes.
Business intelligence platform for climate change risk
A patient data lookup, retrieval and enrichment API for medical records.

MinervaAI is an automated screening platform for anti-money laundering compliance programs. It automates and facilitates the costly processes of enhanced due diligence, negative news analysis, and social media analysis to help AML operations run more efficiently.
A headless software platform for B2B marketplaces that both buyers and sellers love.

Notch is an essential tool that brings precision to the chaos of ordering food service supplies. Notch helps you spend less time ordering product and more time honing your passion – whether you’re a buyer or distributor.
A mobile-first game studio targeting millennial and Gen-X players that want to play competitively, in short sessions.
Harnessing the power of AI, OneLocal provides innovative digital marketing solutions, specifically tailored to address the needs of small local businesses.

Our mission is to provide access to life-changing educational and career opportunities. Passage's platform empowers immigrants and international students by matching their unique talents with crucial workforce needs in Canada. We then work to provide financing and the support needed to facilitate their transformational journeys to study or work abroad.
An efficient B2B payment network for SME.

A B2B marketplace platform that fosters buyer confidence and empowers ethical producers and brands worldwide. With production management software and order financing cash advances, PBP makes it simple for buyers to work with small-batch producers from all over the world.
An online residential real estate marketplace that takes the stress out of selling a home by purchasing homes directly from sellers in as few as five days.

A biotechnology company that uses computational tools to design drugs for the protein-based drug market. ProteinQure leverages breakthroughs in AI and quantum computing to predict the structure of small and large proteins.
Pulse makes remote work better. It goes beyond the green dot to signal availability, reduce interruptions, increase collaboration or however you choose to configure it.
A login for blockchain applications. Ramper's API helps developers make their crypto apps more usable, starting with Terra and Polygon networks.
An emerging game development studio creating imaginative new worlds with inspired storytelling and rewards

Rebelstork is an online marketplace for durable baby gear that serves customers in Canada and the US. The company aims to reduce the number of baby gear products ending up in landfills by working with third-party logistics providers to acquire products, and by collaborating with brands as an off-price distributor, dropshipper, and verified resale platform.
A mobile company which allows users to place food and drink orders without ever standing in line.
A SaaS platform for enterprise. It allows users to create visual roadmaps of product timelines, allowing group viewing and commenting to help with the collaborative process across departments.
Secoda helps teams of all sizes capture their data knowledge, making finding, using, and understanding data simple.
Set.fm is a mobile music platform for both musicians and their fans to create and interact with high-quality audio of their live performances. Acquired by PledgeMusic.
Shakepay allows Canadians to participate in the crypto economy.
Shakudo is developing an end-to-end platform designed to take AI teams from ideation to production at breakthrough speeds.
A global provider of travel identification requirements, providing travellers with the information and documentation they require to move confidently and securely across borders.
A dating platform for Gen-Z. Snack leverages an algorithmic feed to help drive better matchmaking and interactions between prospective partners
Snowball is a mobile app that shows your messages from Facebook, Snapchat, WhatsApp, SMS and all your other social apps in one place. Acquired by Credit Karma.
Stacked is a video game live-streaming platform that is owned and operated by its community.
Stadium Live is building the authentic digital world for next-gen sports fans and communities. Users create avatars to build and experience sports, music and culture together.
A suite of SaaS tools that connect retailers, Third- Party Logistics (3PLs), and local Delivery Service Providers (DSPs) to enable cost-effective same-day shipping.
A meta-community that acquires and builds online communities
An analytics platform that measures viewership data for television networks and advertising agencies
The Tempo Smart Calendar is a mobile productivity app for organizing your day. Acquired by Salesforce (NYSE: CRM).

Terminal is Plaid for telematics data in commercial trucking. Companies building insurance products and fleet software for trucking use their unified API to access GPS data, speeding data and vehicle stats.

A marketplace to consult with top interior designers from across the globe via video consultations. The Expert breaks down traditional barriers, eliminating the need for a high budget or a full-service requirement to access personalized advice from an expert.
A workflow management platform for small teams. TimeHero uses AI to automatically plan daily tasks, projects, and recurring work.
Tiny Mile is building the next generation of delivery, powering a fleet of remotely managed robots that enable 15-minute delivery, 10x cheaper than traditional methods.
An in-classroom interactive web and mobile platform focused on enhancing the professor-student interactive classroom experience.
Toucan uses adaptive learning algorithms and artificial intelligence to digitize the global education market.
Umamicart is an online grocery store for Asian products and ingredients. Their carefully curated selection includes both traditional staples, as well as up-and-coming Asian-American owned brands.
An online platform that aggregates authentic product reviews, enriched with community data and machine learning to curate a trustworthy and effortless experience for consumers.
